description:
Replacement of Alt-Tab, iterates through windows in a cover-flow manner.

It *does* cycle backward while `Shift' key holded (eg. Alt-Tab cycles forward, Alt-Shift-Tab cycles backward.)

If you experienced misbehavior, error, or even crash, please file an issue at google code project page (with "~/.xsession-error" or the log of gnome-shell). Thanks!
name: Coverflow Alt-Tab
